sgpack-desc:
Stargate Wiki Extension Pack
• Extnds the parser with trim,userinfo,#recursiv,#tocmod and #in.
• DDInsert: Insert text and pictures with buttons, text or dropdown list. Create JSButton
• NewArticle: Select article template when creating a new article.
• AddWhosOnline: Remove user from WhosOnline when logged out, add entry to personal menu.
• CacheArray: Array function for templates - uses cache for speed.• Sort2: Create sorted lists.
sgpack-sghtml-image-edit-desc: The icon for getting to the top of the site
